column3: ## Upload correctly structured file with multiple journals and it is processed correctly
Ensure that the archive package has been created with correct structure
Ensure that the archive package contains more than one article with different journals
Select 'Browse' and select the package zip file

column4: A flash message appears at the top of the screen: File uploaded and waiting to be processed.
Upload status is shown in 'History of uploads' with status processing

column3: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data).  If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

column4: Upload status in 'History of uploads' changes to 'successfully processed' and the 'Notes' shows as 'uploaded to archive server'
Under the label 'UPLOADED PACKAGES', details of the packages that were uploaded are displayed in the format <journal_id>_<Date>.tar.gz
